title: Bug 40771ajde apis are unnecessariy coupled to swing
description: Bug 40771ajde apis are unnecessariy coupled to swing
OB: The AJDE APIs are coupled to javax.swing by org.aspectj.ajde.EditorManager.The EditorManager needs to be refactored, have swing specific parts moved toorg.aspectj.ajde.ui.swing and org.aspectj.ajbrowser.
